title: #main-window need to support transparency
content:
Hi guys. I really want to ask Firefox developers to add the ability for #main-window to support transparency - background color: transparent .

Any attempt to add transparency, or color with an alpha channel breaks the increase and decrease of the window, and the borders of some windows have bugs. When adding a normal color to the background, everything remains correct and works fine.


PS: I mean css customization. html id="main-window" css #main-window
creator: dmtiir

title: Dropdown menus not visible
content:
Dropdown menus do not show up.

Yet alt F X works for File Exit.
creator: wh

title: On screen keyboard not coming up
content: So I have a HP Pavilion x360 and when I try to use it in tablet mode on Firefox and tap a text entry field, the on screen keyboard appears for a split-second and goes away. It doesn't do this for any other software on my PC but Firefox. Any advice?
creator: techmaster725

title: Fullscreen message showing after turning it off
content:
I changed full-screen-api.warning.delay and full-screen-api.warning.timeout to 0 and I still get the message when I hover to the top of the screen with my mouse is there a way to remove it completly?

full-screen-api.approval-required to flase also doesn't help!
creator: alex_2307

title: Latest FF update ERASED ALL SAVED WEBPAGES AND FAVORITES
content:
Today, 6/10/22, I did what we sheep are trained to do, click on the latest update. What happened next is excruciatingly painful: EVERY SINGLE--ALL--FAVORITES AND SAVED PAGES--YEARS, YEARS WORTH OF SAVED PAGES AND FAVORITES, ERASED, GONE, WIPED OUT.

WHAT IS GOING ON? WAS THIS INTENTIONALLY PROGRAMMED? YEARS WORTH OF SAVED PAGES, GONE!!!

So I clicked on an excitingly named "restore" type link. Which resulted in only today's subsequent web activity being included.

What are you people doing?
creator: lynthomas107

title: having trouble downloading firefox
content: just need help figuring out how to install. I hit install but nothing happened.
creator: wylcoyote7

title: spam.
content: I opened my mail and it seemed like all my spam was showing up in my inbox. And I haven't been able to find where the spam controls are
